main.description: A segment or partial review of media in progress, allowing users to share thoughts on specific sections (e.g., chapters, episodes) as they consume the content.

title.description: Title for this review segment (e.g., 'Chapter 5 thoughts', 'Episode 3 reactions').

text.description: The review segment text content - thoughts on this specific section.

percentage.description: Percentage of completion when this segment was written (0-100).

mediaItemId.description: Optional reference to media_items table for aggregated data.

mediaType.description: Type of media: book, movie, tv, podcast, article, game, music, course, etc.

listItem.description: Optional reference (AT-URI) to the associated list item being reviewed.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when this review segment was created.
